pullRequest.title: [Backport 0.24] Detect reprocessing issues
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Backport of #5421
It is mainly a cherry-pick. Only the UpgradeTest is a bit different. I ignored the upgradeWithoutSnapshot() test case instead of upgradeWithSnapshot() because the snapshot is created but can not be deleted. 😅
Related issues
closes #5381

nodes.bodyText: Can remove this, right? It is not relevant for 0.24.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -100,6 +103,42 @@
                 .afterUpgrade(UpgradeTest::publishMessage)
                 .done()
           },
+          // TODO (saig0): enable the test case when upgrading from 0.25.0

commit.message:
chore(engine): detect reprocessing failures

* try to detect reprocessing issues while doing the reprocessing
* the detection helps to root cause upgrade issues
